mapper.select: select * from Region
select * from Region where region_num = #{region_num}
select a.* from CarCampingRegion a, Region b where a.region_num = b.region_num and b.region_num =#{region_num}
select a.* from CarCampingRegion a where region_num = #{region_num} and a.ccr_popular=0 order by ratingRegion(a.ccr_num,a.ccr_likeCount,a.ccr_reviewCount) desc limit 4
select a.* from CarCampingRegion a where a.ccr_popular = 0 order by ratingRegion(a.ccr_num,a.ccr_likeCount,a.ccr_reviewCount) desc limit 10
SELECT * FROM CarCampingRegion where ccr_popular=1 and ccr_score>=4 order by ccr_score desc limit 10
select * from CarCampingRegion where ccr_num = #{ccr_num}

select c.*,m.*from (select @ROWNUM :=@ROWNUM +1 as ROWNUM,a.* from ReviewRegion a,(select @ROWNUM:=0) b where a.ccr_num=#{ccr_num} and a.review_adminConfirm=0 order by ${orderBy} desc) c join Member m on c.mem_num = m.mem_num limit #{startRow},#{endRow}
select count(*) from ReviewRegion a,CarCampingRegion b where a.ccr_num=#{ccr_num} and a.ccr_num=b.ccr_num and a.review_adminConfirm=0

select c.*,m.* from (select @ROWNUM :=@ROWNUM +1 as ROWNUM,a.* from ReviewRegion a,(select @ROWNUM:=0) b where a.ccr_num=#{ccr_num} and a.review_adminConfirm=0 and a.${search} like CONCAT('%',#{searchString},'%') order by ${orderBy} desc) c join Member m on c.mem_num = m.mem_num limit #{startRow},#{endRow}
select count(*) from ReviewRegion a,CarCampingRegion b where a.ccr_num=#{ccr_num} and a.ccr_num=b.ccr_num and a.review_adminConfirm=0 and a.${search} like CONCAT('%',#{searchString},'%')

select * from (select @ROWNUM :=@ROWNUM +1 as ROWNUM,a.* from ReviewRegion as a,(select @ROWNUM:=0) b where a.ccr_num=#{ccr_num} and a.review_adminConfirm=0)c,Member d where c.mem_num = d.mem_num and d.${search} like CONCAT('%',#{searchString},'%') order by c.${orderBy} desc limit #{startRow},#{endRow}

select count(*) from (select a.* from ReviewRegion a,CarCampingRegion b where a.ccr_num=#{ccr_num} and a.ccr_num=b.ccr_num and a.review_adminConfirm=0)c,Member d where c.mem_num = d.mem_num and d.${search} like CONCAT('%',#{searchString},'%')
